en-US.name: Play Canvas Starter
en-US.summary: A working generic implementation of intagrating a Play Canvas game with Alexa
en-US.description: Look for documentation on the Alexa Skills Kit in general, and at github.com/csubagio/alexa-playcanvas to understand how to modify the skill to support your game!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Explain to the the Alexa team broadly how to start your game and how it works, so they can verify that it's running correctly across a range of Alexa devices.
